    From P&R Defensive Switch	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-
    From Other Man-To-Man Defense	100%	42	44	1.048	28%	Below Average	17	19	36	52.8%	52.8%	4.8%	11.9%	9.5%	52.4%

    Turnover/Fouled	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-
  Turnover/Fouled	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-	-
